questions.question: What is the dominant color of the product's packaging?
What shape is the container holding the product?
What material appears to be used for the product's primary container?
What is the overall texture of the visible product surface?
What type of seal or lid does the container possess?
What kind of graphic design element is prominently featured on the side?
What is the most noticeable text on the product packaging?
What certification logo is displayed on the packaging, indicating dietary restrictions?
Is there a visible barcode on the container's side?

What appears to be the primary ingredient listed on the packaging?
What decorative border is seen at the bottom of the packaging?
Considering the labeling, does this seem like an organic product?
Is there an indication of weight or volume on the container?
Does the packaging display any type of nutritional information?
